markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Sure Foot](/Feats.aspx?ID=1989) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Skill" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=144" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 177 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Horizon Walker](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=63)

**Prerequisites**
[Horizon Walker Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1987); Expert in [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1); Expert in [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3)

</column>

---

You know the secrets of moving in your favored terrain. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to skill checks to move within your favored terrain, such as [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) checks to [Balance](/Actions.aspx?ID=28) on ice, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) checks to [Swim](/Actions.aspx?ID=39) in rough water, Acrobatics checks to [Fly](/Actions.aspx?ID=94) in windy conditions, and so forth.
name: Sure Foot
prerequisite: Horizon Walker Dedication; Expert in Acrobatics; Expert in Athletics
prerequisite_markdown: [Horizon Walker Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1987); Expert in [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1); Expert in [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3)
